titleStmt.title: The forme and manner of making and consecrating bishops, priestes and deacons.
Ordinal
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
Barker, Robert, d. 1645, printer.
Bill, John, d. 1630, printer.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings Most Excellent Maiesty, and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: sign. A₄₋₅ bound and filmed out of order, following B₃.
Reproductions of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 2098:4), and New York Public Library (reel 2353:3b).

Bound and filmed with, at reel 2353:3b: STC 16392. The booke of common prayer and administration of the sacraments ... London, 1633 (preceding). -- STC 2639. Sternhold, T. The whole booke of psalmes. London, 1633 (following).
